title: Flor de Lotus
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Macrobiotic, Organic, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar, Delivery, Brazilian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small, natural food buffet restaurant that's all vegan except for fish. Has brown rice, hot foods, salad, miso soup, empanadas, and more. Like many restaurants in Brazil (especially those in commercial areas), you pay for food by weight. The price is around R$35/kg.
